page.title: 06VILLAGE GROWTH
page.content: AS WITH S.W.F. HULLBRIDGE AT ONE TIME WAS A SMALL RIVERSIDE VILLAGE AND WAS THEN DEVELOPED IN THE 1960'S, THE MAJORITY OF HOUSING PRIVATE. THE GROWTH OF POPULATION IN BOTH VILLAGES HAS MAINLY ARISEN FROM PEOPLE MOVING AWAY FROM URBAN AREAS NEARER LONDON. {SCHOOL SAMPLE ELMWOOD S.W.F.} 107 FAMILIES-REASONS FOR MOVING TO S.W.F. RANK ORDER: BETTER ENVIRONMENT BETTER VALUE FOR MONEY IN HOUSING JOB REASONS. SURVEY ALSO INDICATED THAT THE PREVIOUS PLACES OF RESIDENCE OF FAMILIES FELL INTO 3 MAIN GROUPS: OTHER PARTS OF ESSEX LONDON AND GREATER LONDON OTHER PARTS OF THE U.K..
